data.name: World of Warships - Yubari Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

A warship of huge combat potential, Yūbari can act as a support cruiser and a stealth hunter with equal efficiency. She boasts a set of features envied by the majority of lower-tier ships, ranging from her equivalent speed of a destroyer to the deadly torpedoes she carries and mighty AA armament she wields.

Advantages:

  • Effective AA guns for her tier: Yūbari can pose a deadly threat to hostile air groups.
  • Torpedoes that can deliver damage up to 15,000 HP, and cruise at a speed of 63 knots with a range of 6 km. This powerful armament, however, requires some skill to use efficiently since there is just one twin torpedo tube on each broadside.
  • Impressive handling and a speed of 34.5 knots.
  • Extra credits per battle and 50% more XP provided by the permanent camouflage.

The pack also includes:

  • Port slot;
  • Steam commemorative flag;
  • Steam container.

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 997 Doubloons as compensation.

She boasts a set of features envied by the majority of lower-tier ships, ranging from her equivalent speed of a destroyer to the deadly torpedoes she carries and mighty AA armament she wields.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
